def-en: A finetuning protocol in which the pretrained model is able to see a few data points from the new data set during finetuning.
def-ga: Cur chuige mion-fheabsaithe ina bhfuil an tsamhail réamh-thraenáilte in ann cúpla sonra ó thacar sonraí nua a fheiceáil le linn á mion-fheabhsaithe.

prov.sonra: féach ar an téarma 'database / bunachar sonraí'
